Providing realistic business management simulations of financing, investing, and more, as well as a wide variety of customizable options for all your vehicles, A-Train: All Aboard Tourism is packed full of features for you to explore.
But don't be overwhelmed—players old and new alike will be able to jump right into the series thanks to the fun and practical tutorials provided in the early stages.
So why not hop aboard the A-Train with your trusted team of advisors, and start crafting a bright future for your town?

【A Story to Save a Troubled Town】
Featuring 11 scenarios set in towns burdened by various circumstances—like “a town saddled with massive debt after opening a bullet train line” or “a town run by a railway company owning a perpetually loss-making baseball team”!
Every town holds hidden charm, especially tourist destinations lacking developed transportation networks, offering ample room for growth. It's where the president's skills truly shine—deciding which tracks to lay and what kind of towns to build.

【Aim to Become an A-Train Creator】
Featuring a “Construction” mode where you can freely shape terrain and place buildings without worrying about funds. Create anything from your ideal tourist attraction to real-world cities within the world of ‘A-Train’.
Vehicle plans in the scenario can be shared online! Of course, you can also download and play those created by other players.
Enjoy planning your trip with the same accessibility for everyone and the same boundless depth.

※This product is a bundle containing the main game “A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism” and the additional content “Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Upgrade Pack.” If you already own “A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism,” please purchase only the additional content.
70010000104151.intro: A bustling city plan just for you
70010000104151.name: A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism Nintendo Switch 2 Edition

70010000105385.description:
Cast n Chill's a laid-back fishin’ game for folks who’d rather wet a line than break a sweat. Whether yer driftin’ on a lazy lake, pokin’ 'round a winding river, or droppin’ lines in salty blue water, this here’s a game where you set the pace.

Upgrade Yer Gear.
Start with the basics, catch whatever bites, sell your haul, and put those coins toward better rods, reels, and upgrades. Before ya know it, you’ll be wranglin’ rare species that’d make any angler green with envy.

Explore New Waters.
Find yer favourite fishin’ hole or keep wanderin’. There’s 16 peaceful spots to discover, each with its own critters swimmin’ 'round, just waitin’ to bite.

Pick Your Pace.
In Active Mode, you’re in the thick of it - castin’, reelin’, and keepin’ busy like a loon at nesting time.

Switch to Passive Mode if you’d rather let the game do the work while you’re off choppin’ wood. 

Collect 'Em All.
There’s 50 fish to discover - some you’ll recognize, some you’ll squint at and go “what in the heck is that?” From scrappy little sunfish to big ol’ deepwater beasts, they’re all in the logbook waitin’ for your name.

Legendary Catches
There’s 16 fish out there that still get folks jabberin’ at ol' Rusty's bait shop like they saw Bigfoot ride a moose. Land one, and you'll be part o' the legend.

Boat Buddies
Grab your rod and call a buddy, Cast 'n Chill now has co-op! Whether you’re lookin’ to kick back and fish side-by-side or stir up a bit of friendly competition, it’s all better with company.

Trusty Companion
Nothin’ beats a day on the lake with a four-legged friend. They might not know a spinnerbait from a spoon, but they’ll help you spot a fish - if only 'cause they’re hopin’ for a bite themselves.
70010000105385.intro: Catch rare fish, upgrade your gear and reel in legendary catches - all with your loyal companion by your side.
70010000105385.name: Cast n Chill

70010000107447.description:
Clutchtime: Basketball is a deck builder centered around basketball plays and team synergies.

Different game modes:
• Elimination tournaments in true roguelike style, or
• Classic regular season where you can lose some games, but have to qualify and win the playoffs to become a Champion.

Each mode can be played in single player mode, or shared screen with your friends. You can set up custom modes like 2-player best-of-7 finals series, or a 3-player mini league where you play each other twice, once home and once away and then the top 2 players play the final game. It's fully customizable.

Each team has a starting deck of 5 starter players with 3 cards representing their skills.

Random events happen during the season, which allow you to:
• trade with other teams
• upgrade cards
• remove cards that don't fit your strategy
• duplicate your favorite cards
• and more...

Double Team your opponents and force Turnovers or create a dream team of Superstar shooters who Splash three pointers even while getting fouled.

You can also get team cards like:
• Timeout,
• Coach Challenge
• or even Complain to the Referees...
• ...to get a Tech.

Can you help your favorite team win the Championship?
70010000107447.intro: Build your perfect deck and become a Champion
70010000107447.name: Clutchtime: Basketball Deckbuilder

70010000108740.description:
What is Older? is a fun, brain-teasing game where you choose which historical event, invention, or milestone happened first. From fire to smartphones, test your sense of time and chase the ultimate high score!

Ever wondered if the wheel spun before the first pyramid was built? Or if cave paintings came before humans tamed dogs? In What is Older?, you’ll dive into the wild timeline of human history for a laugh-out-loud challenge. Pick between two options—Option A or Option B—and guess which one hit the scene first. Easy, right? Not when you’re stuck deciding if the compass sailed before the flush toilet or if the printing press outraced the first eyeglasses!

In this single-mode game, your mission is to stack up the highest score by nailing the older event, invention, or cultural moment. Our list covers everything from the first flicker of fire to the rise of modern gadgets, packed with epic achievements, quirky discoveries, and surprising milestones.

Get it right, and your score soars. Get it wrong, and you’re back to the Stone Age to try again! Perfect for history lovers, trivia fans, or anyone who enjoys a chuckle while learning something new, What is Older? will keep you guessing about the past. Ready to show you’re the sharpest time traveler around? Jump in and start picking!
70010000108740.intro: Think you know the history? Jump into the game and find out – choose wisely and become the champion.
70010000108740.name: What is Older?

70010000108861.description:
Step into the heart of intense, fast-paced combat with Call of Warfare - FPS Modern Shooter, a groundbreaking military shooter that brings tactical warfare to your fingertips. As part of an elite squad, you'll engage in high-stakes 5v5 battles, strategically outsmarting rival teams while striving to eliminate their 1000-point score before they can do the same to you. With your team's survival on the line, every decision, every shot, and every move counts.
Key Features:
- Tactical Combat: Take on the role of a highly-trained operative and lead your team through intense skirmishes, using strategy and skill to outsmart your opponents.
- Points-Based Warfare: Every kill deducts points from your team's score. Lose all points and face defeat.
- Dynamic Maps: Battle across diverse environments, each offering unique challenges and opportunities.
- Massive Arsenal: Choose from over 20 weapons, including rifles, shotguns, and grenades, to suit your playstyle.
- Immersive Action: Realistic gunplay and visuals bring the battlefield to life, putting your tactical skills to the ultimate test.

Get ready to experience warfare like never before in Call of Warfare - FPS Modern Shooter. Join the battlefield, hone your skills, and prove you have what it takes to lead your squad to victory. The ultimate test of strategy and skill awaits. Will you answer the call?
70010000108861.intro: Outsmart, Outgun, Outlast. The Battlefield Awaits!
70010000108861.name: Call of Warfare - FPS MODERN SHOOTER

70010000109182.description:
Take the role of a young graduate student in AI studies in Baradroid. Evan lives with 3 robots as a means of studying their behavior and teaching them to interact more naturally with humans. Evan hopes to develop a new generation of androids based on his research, one that can advance society and help overcome human limitations, but over time, one question grows in his mind.

Is it possible to teach a machine the meaning of human love? Baradroid is a visual novel and dating sim set in a futuristic and idealized world. Make key choices for Evan that guide the narrative and perhaps some romance as well… for science, of course.

• Explore relationships between a researcher and his robots!
• Immerse yourself in a futuristic visual novel adventure!
• Guide Evan’s efforts to advance AI technology!
• Make decisions that affect the narrative!
• Enjoy dating sim elements and unlockable scenes!
70010000109182.intro: Teach robots to experience love in a futuristic world where the lines between humanity and synthetic life begin to blur!
70010000109182.name: Baradroid

70010000110971.description:
"Do you know the story of Luminous?"

Uplifting music and
An exciting work in which you defeat more and more monsters in the world of swords.
An impressive character advances through the ruins with the village's treasured sword

□STORY
The boy's name is Luck.
A villager living in a remote village.
He wants to be a hero.
It is said that anyone who sees Luminous will be praised by everyone.
Luck took out the village sword to be praised by everyone.

"I want to be like a hero."

Luck is determined in his heart,
He headed to the ruins where monsters were wandering.
The ruins of a monster that villagers do not approach.
Will Luck be able to see the Luminous?

□GAME
・Easy control, simple sword attack and jump
・Swing the sword down at the monster, cut vertically
・Swing the sword from the side, cross
・Attack quickly, thrust
・Use three different attacks to defeat monsters
・Explore by pressing a switch to open a closed door
・Let's go see Luminous with Luck

□SOUND
・Rhythmic high-quality background music that beats the world of swords

□SYSTEM
・Every time you attack a monster, you get experience points.
・Raise your level and defeat powerful enemies.
70010000110971.intro: A simple and easy-to-play sword world. A small adventure of a boy who defeats monsters one after another with good music.
70010000110971.name: LuminousStoria

70010000112303.description:
Cast n Chill's a laid-back fishin’ game for folks who’d rather wet a line than break a sweat. Whether yer driftin’ on a lazy lake, pokin’ 'round a winding river, or droppin’ lines in salty blue water, this here’s a game where you set the pace.

Upgrade Yer Gear.
Start with the basics, catch whatever bites, sell your haul, and put those coins toward better rods, reels, and upgrades. Before ya know it, you’ll be wranglin’ rare species that’d make any angler green with envy.

Explore New Waters.
Find yer favourite fishin’ hole or keep wanderin’. There’s 16 peaceful spots to discover, each with its own critters swimmin’ 'round, just waitin’ to bite.

Pick Your Pace.
In Active Mode, you’re in the thick of it - castin’, reelin’, and keepin’ busy like a loon at nesting time.

Switch to Passive Mode if you’d rather let the game do the work while you’re off choppin’ wood. 

Collect 'Em All.
There’s 50 fish to discover - some you’ll recognize, some you’ll squint at and go “what in the heck is that?” From scrappy little sunfish to big ol’ deepwater beasts, they’re all in the logbook waitin’ for your name.

Legendary Catches
There’s 16 fish out there that still get folks jabberin’ at ol' Rusty's bait shop like they saw Bigfoot ride a moose. Land one, and you'll be part o' the legend.

Boat Buddies
Grab your rod and call a buddy, Cast 'n Chill now has co-op! Whether you’re lookin’ to kick back and fish side-by-side or stir up a bit of friendly competition, it’s all better with company.

Trusty Companion
Nothin’ beats a day on the lake with a four-legged friend. They might not know a spinnerbait from a spoon, but they’ll help you spot a fish - if only 'cause they’re hopin’ for a bite themselves.
70010000112303.intro: Catch rare fish, upgrade your gear and reel in legendary catches - all with your loyal companion by your side.
70010000112303.name: Cast n Chill - Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition

70050000056210.description:
This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Fuscus! 
Puzzle your way through 160 brand-new levels!
70050000056210.intro: Unlocks a new world for hexceed: Fuscus brings 160 new puzzles and includes all mechanics from the previous DLC.
70050000056210.name: Fuscus

70050000065654.description: Cast n Chill – Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition features higher-definition visuals, along with super smooth performance at 120 frames per second in docked mode.
70050000065654.name: Cast n Chill - Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition Upgrade Pack

70050000066434.description:
The Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition delivers enhanced visuals and improved playability.
Experience a new level of immersion.

【Intuitive operation with mouse support】
Supports mouse operation using Joy-Con™ 2 and USB mice.
You can lay tracks and build structures more intuitively.
We've also added options to adjust UI size and main menu icon layout for easier mouse-based play.

【Playable in “Nintendo Switch 2 Mode”】
Added “Nintendo Switch 2 Mode,” which allows you to use more railway vehicles, automobiles, and vehicle plans than usual!
Extend your routes to every corner of the city, run more trains, and make the city even more convenient.
(Save data created in this mode is for play on Nintendo Switch 2 only.)

【Enhanced Graphics & Frame Rate】
Enhanced screen resolution, improved textures, and water reflections make graphics more beautiful, while increased maximum frame rates deliver smoother motion!
Enjoy the sight of trains running through towns with heightened immersion.
*Some effects require enabling graphics options.

【Added Convenient Features】
Auto save feature included! If you make a mistake, you can revert to a state from a little while ago.
It also supports the Nintendo Switch 2's built-in “GameChat” feature.

※Additional scenarios are available in Japanese only.
※This product is additional content exclusively for “A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism.” If you do not own “A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism,” please purchase the bundle product “A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism Nintendo Switch 2 Edition.”
70050000066434.intro: A bustling city plan just for you
70050000066434.name: A-Train: All Aboard! Tourism Nintendo Switch 2 Edition upgrade pack

70010000092683.description: Nordic Ashes is a challenging Norse inspired roguelite-survivor game, where you’ll have to survive hordes of creatures that come your way.
70010000092683.name: Nordic Ashes: The Complete Saga

70010000096351.description:
Build your dream arcade at your own pace. No pressure, no deadlines, just a cozy space to fill with games, decorations, warm neon lights and a bite-sized playthrough duration. 

Create
Design your arcade from the ground up, shaping its layout while choosing from a handful of structures, furniture, decoration and arcade machines.


Unlock
Use your Computer to unlock new objects, expand your land and customize your character.


Enjoy
Invite charming, randomly generated alien guests and watch them spend time in your creation.


Are you ready to bring your dream arcade to life?
70010000096351.intro: A cozy sci-fi arcade sim where you build, customize, unlock, expand and welcome cute alien visitors!
70010000096351.name: Cosmic Arcade Tycoon

70010000099930.description:
Step into the whimsical world of Cup Heroes, where everyday cups turn into mighty heroes on an epic quest to save their beloved Queen! 

How to Play: 
- Control Your Heroes: Navigate your heroes through various obstacles and puzzles. 
- Save the Queen: Your ultimate goal is to rescue the Queen who has been captured by evil forces. 
- Unlock and Upgrade Characters: Collect coins and gems to unlock a diverse cast of characters, each with unique abilities. Upgrade their skills to make them even more powerful and adaptable to different challenges. 

Features: 
- Unique Characters: Meet a colourful cast of cup heroes, from the brave Knight Cup to the cunning Ninja Cup. Each character brings their own special skills and personality to the team. 
- Epic Adventures: Explore various enchanting worlds, from mystical forests to fiery volcanoes. Every level is a new adventure filled with hidden secrets and dangerous foes. 
- Challenging Puzzles: Test your brain with mind-bending puzzles that require clever solutions. Use your heroes’ abilities to overcome obstacles and progress through the game. 
- Exciting Battles: Engage in thrilling combat with evil minions and powerful bosses. Use your heroes’ special moves and teamwork to defeat enemies and save the Queen. 
- Beautiful Graphics: Enjoy stunning, colourful graphics that bring the world of Cup Heroes to life. Each scene is meticulously designed to enhance your gaming experience. 
- Daily Quests: Log in every day to participate in limited-time quests to earn multiple resources
- Addictive Gameplay: Easy to learn but hard to master

Your Cup Heroes are waiting for you to lead them to victory!
70010000099930.intro: Join the adventure of a lifetime!
70010000099930.name: Cup Heroes

70010000102153.description:
Stranded in the middle of the endless ocean, you have nothing but a fragile raft and a rusty hook. The waves are unforgiving, the sharks never rest, and your only chance is to survive one day at a time.
Gather floating debris, expand your raft, and turn it into a shelter strong enough to withstand storms and predators. Explore hidden islands, uncover the secrets of the deep, and craft tools that will keep you alive against all odds.

Features:
	•	Build, repair, and upgrade your raft
	•	Craft weapons, tools, and survival gear
	•	Explore mysterious tropical islands and dive beneath the waves
	•	Face relentless sharks and other ocean threats

Will you transform a handful of planks into a fortress of survival, or will the ocean claim you?
70010000102153.intro: Discover islands, craft tools, and battle the deep.
70010000102153.name: OCEAN RAFT SIMULATOR & SURVIVAL

70010000106085.description:
Enter the world of Mech Arena Shooter Battle, a single-player roguelike where you pilot a war machine through procedurally generated arenas filled with deadly enemies, traps, and upgrades. Each battle tests your reflexes, tactics, and ability to adapt as you gather resources, upgrade your mech, and face powerful bosses.

The fate of a ruined world lies in your metal hands — every death is just the beginning of a new, stronger build. Experiment with different weapon combinations, defensive systems, and tactical modules to forge the ultimate war machine and uncover the mystery behind the world’s collapse.

Key Features:

- Procedurally generated arenas with unique layouts and enemy patterns
- Deep upgrade system - customize your mech with weapons, armor, and tactical modules
- Multiple weapon types: ballistic, energy, and melee systems
- Challenging boss encounters with unique combat mechanics
- Persistent meta-progression - unlock new mechs, weapons, and abilities after each run
- Diverse environments - from ruined cities to industrial and space complexes
- Atmospheric cyberpunk-post-apocalyptic visual style

Victory isn’t about survival — it’s about evolution. Adapt, upgrade, and dominate the battlefield in Mech Arena Shooter Battle.
70010000106085.intro: Not just a machine - a weapon with memory.
70010000106085.name: Mech Arena Shooter Battle

70010000107331.description:
Krampus is Coming! Grab your shotgun, finish your hot punch and don't forget your mission: Save the Christmas! 

Big Trouble in Little Chimney is a fast paced arena bullet-hell shooter.

Survive endless hordes of creatures lurk from the dark chimney and save the Christmas!

Try to beat your highscore!


Features:
* Simple controls and pure arcade action
* Quick 10 minute play sessions
* Over 10 brutal enemy types
* Plenty of guns
* Collect jingle bells and earn new upgrades as you progress
* Unlock New Weapons and special abilities in the Santa's Store
* 2 Game modes: Krampus is coming, Giftpocalypse
* Great music by Kevin MacLeod
70010000107331.intro: Save the Christmas by shooting enemies.
70010000107331.name: Big Trouble in Little Chimney

70050000066539.description:
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- Japan map
- Tanuki Skin
- Sensei Skin
- Sushi Master Skin
- Koi Carp Skin
- Geisha Skin
- Tengu Skin
- Kitsune Skin

Choose your cool skin, eat bamboo, shrines, statues, cherry blossoms, castles and grow BIG!
70050000066539.intro: Wear traditional skins and visit the new Japan map with your friends!
70050000066539.name: Hole io: Japan DLC

70050000066554.description:
With DLC, You'll unlock:
- The Legendary boxer: El Loco!
- His iconic gloves, shorts and shoes!
- 21500 experience

See for yourself how it feels to be a boxing legend!
70050000066554.intro: Play as the legendary El Loco and relive his journey to the top!
70050000066554.name: Real Boxing 2: Remastered - El Loco DLC

70050000066557.description:
With DLC, You'll unlock:
- The Legendary boxer: Mark Rouser!
- His iconic gloves, shorts and shoes!
- 21500 experience

See for yourself how it feels to be a boxing legend!
70050000066557.intro: Play as the legendary Mark Rouser and relive his journey to the top!
70050000066557.name: Real Boxing 2: Remastered - Mark Rouser DLC

70070000031928.description:
Spy Guy is the perfect game for any occasion! Take on the role of a detective and search for hidden objects on various maps in three modes. 
For Christmas, we have created a set that will not only reveal the Christmas map included in the main game, but also take you on a journey to different cities! It's a unique gift you can give yourself for Christmas and beyond!
70070000031928.intro: Make yourself a gift and buy a detective game for Christmas!
70070000031928.name: Spy Guy Christmas

70070000032326.description:
Choose your favorite skin, eat, grow and stay alive. Compete in multiplayer mode with up to 4 players or eat it all by yourself.

Hole io: Blossom Edition features:
- 7 maps with different things to swallow 
- 20 animated skins to make your black hole look cooler
- 2 multiplayer modes up to 4 players on one screen!
- endless mode where you swallow things falling from the sky
- powerups spawning during the game
- collecting themed stickers
- easy controls so anyone can play
- simple rules and lots of fun!

Grow by swallowing everything in front of you, whether it be garbage cans, fire hydrants or cars. Get large enough to consume even bigger objects or other players. Eat until nothing and no one is standing in your way!
70070000032326.intro: Show who is the biggest black hole in the entire universe!
70070000032326.name: Hole io: Blossom Edition

70070000032355.description:
Discover a whole new world of combat sports games. As a newbie boxer, challenge experienced opponents and try to win and score a KO! Explore the world of boxing and make your way to the top. You can become the boxing champion, the best warrior of all time! So get ready to punch, and punch hard! Discover what you’re made of, and try to climb to the top.

This bundle includes: 
- Real Boxing 2: Remastered
- Real Boxing 2: Remastered - El Loco DLC

Become the ultimate champion! Use jabs, hooks, uppercuts & combine them into devastating combos.

PLAY AS A LEGENDARY BOXER
Receive the legendary El Loco with his unique equipment and a bonus of 21500 experience points right from the start!

REMASTERED VERSION
A brand new challenge awaits you as the game has been rebalanced for a fresh and fair boxing experience. With better effects and improved graphics you can feel like you're boxing for real!

CHOOSE YOUR STYLE OF BOXING
Before you KO your opponent, you need to improve your fighting skills! Adjust your boxer's stats to match your playstyle and level up quickly to unlock new abilities that will help you in fights to come! Use powerful boosts to make your dream come true. Get ready - a KO is in the air!

PLAY MINI-GAMES
Train your fighter in exciting mini games that reflect real life boxers’ training and develop your character! You need to leave a lot of sweat in your training hall to be a champion. No one said it would be an easy challenge!

CREATE YOUR DREAM BOXER
Real Boxing 2 allows you to customize your fighter! Choose your outfit, get a new tattoo and even change your haircut. Adjust all the aspects of the fighter’s body, from mass and muscle sculpture to nose shape.

DRESS TO IMPRESS
As in all fighting sports, it's best to enter the punch-out and serve a smackdown with style, so gear up - equip a pair of boots, trousers and gloves that fit your style and knock down your opponents with your looks alone.

BATTLE AGAINST UNIQUE BOSSES
Take on challenging opponents! Clown? Check. Santa? Yeah, he's there. A real stone golem? You bet. Defeat them all and claim their epic gear!

Join the club, create your boxer, and start your boxing career. Get ready to punch, and punch hard! Discover what you’re made of, and climb to the top!
70070000032355.intro: Take the fight to the next level with a remaster of award winning Real Boxing™ 2. Train hard, fight harder. Prove your worth in the career and multiplayer mode.
70070000032355.name: Real Boxing 2: Remastered - El Loco Edition

70010000105312.description:
America has fallen into enemy hands. It’s up to you to fight back! Build your defenses, rally your firepower, and lead the charge to take the nation back - state by state, battle by battle.

Strategically deploy turrets, unleash devastating machine guns, and adapt your tactics to survive relentless enemy waves and towering bosses. Every victory pushes the front lines forward and brings you one step closer to restoring freedom across the land.

Earn cash from every fallen foe, upgrade your weapons, and unlock powerful new gear to hold the line. Each liberated state strengthens your army and opens up new challenges, enemies, and rewards. With every push and every win, you’re shaping the future of a free America!

Features:
- Tower defense-inspired gameplay with intense tactical action
- Tons of weapons, turrets, and upgrades to build your unstoppable defense
- Ruthless enemies and bosses to test your strategy and reflexes
- Dozens of states and countries to liberate, each with unique challenges and rewards
- Strategic progression system. Earn resources, upgrade gear, and conquer!

Take back the land. Rebuild the nation. Fight For America!
70010000105312.intro: Gear up, soldier - it’s time to reclaim freedom!
70010000105312.name: Fight For America

70010000109948.description:
Take control of a mighty dinosaur in a post-apocalyptic world on a quest to recover its stolen eggs.

Smash through environments, gather resources, and hunt grotesque human-mutants to evolve and grow stronger. Use what you collect to rebuild bridges, restore paths and push deeper into a world filled with danger and mystery. 

Explore vast landscapes, uncover hidden secrets and face terrifying bosses standing between you and your lost brood.

Features:
- Break everything: destroy environments and leave nothing standing
- Use advanced technology: encounter futuristic machines that will aid your survival
- Engage in fierce battles: hunt down mutants and monstrous creatures
- Meet various enemies: take on diverse foes with unique behaviors
- Lead your warriors: command other beasts and dominate the wasteland
- Evolve to become a super beast: grow stronger with every challenge you overcome!

Will you survive and recover your eggs?
70010000109948.name: Raptor Evolution

70010000111493.description:
Explore sunken ships, submarines, and mysterious underwater ruins filled with hidden treasures and fascinating artifacts.

Take your time as you navigate detailed environments, complete exploration objectives, and collect items scattered across the sea floor. Examine each discovery up close, uncovering the secrets of lost vessels and forgotten places.

Features:
• Explore detailed underwater locations, from shipwrecks to ancient ruins
• Find, collect, and examine a wide range of items and relics
• Complete various exploration objectives
• Enjoy a calm, atmospheric experience with no danger or combat
• Relax with immersive underwater sounds and a selection of 9 atmospheric music tracks

Dive deeper, explore further, and uncover what the ocean hides.
70010000111493.intro: Your next great discovery lies just below the surface
70010000111493.name: Dive Expedition

70050000066471.description:
Expand your underwater adventure with the Plane Wreck DLC, introducing a new map filled with thrilling discoveries.

Explore the remains of a crashed airplane lying on the ocean floor and search for valuable objects both inside and around the wreck. Examine lost supplies, gold bars, weapons, and military equipment resting quietly beneath the waves.

With this DLC, you’ll unlock:
• New map to explore - Plane Wreck
• Additional objects and items to find and examine
• New exploration objectives to complete

Start your new expedition and uncover what lies beneath the surface.
70050000066471.intro: Dive into the depths and explore the mysteries of a sunken airplane
70050000066471.name: Dive Expedition: Plane Wreck DLC

70050000066473.description:
Expand your underwater adventure with the Sunken Ship DLC, introducing a new map filled with mystery and treasure.

Explore the remains of a historic ship resting silently beneath the waves. Swim across its wooden decks, peek inside the captain’s cabin, and uncover what remains of its fateful voyage. Search for chests of gold, rare relics, and lost equipment hidden throughout the ship and surrounding seabed.

With this DLC, you’ll unlock:
• New map to explore - Sunken Ship
• Additional objects and items to find and examine
• New exploration objectives to complete

Start your new expedition and uncover what lies beneath the surface.
70050000066473.intro: Dive into the depths and explore the mysteries of a legendary sunken ship
70050000066473.name: Dive Expedition: Sunken Ship DLC

70050000066646.description:
Transform your raptor into a futuristic predator with the Vectoraptor skin - a neon-coated beast powered by pure energy and precision. 

Power up your journey with valuable resources that will fuel your evolution and give you the edge against any enemy that dares to cross your path.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Vectoraptor Skin
- 300 Meat
- 20 Mutagen
- 450 Gems

Unleash your full potential and reclaim your place at the top of the food chain.
70050000066646.intro: Charge into battle with unstoppable energy!
70050000066646.name: Raptor Evolution: Vectoraptor DLC

70050000066648.description:
Set the world ablaze with the Infermadon skin - a raging raptor born from fire. 

Power up your journey with valuable resources that will fuel your evolution and give you the strength to conquer even the fiercest enemies.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Infermadon Skin
- 200 Meat
- 30 Mutagen
- 400 Gems

Unleash your full potential and reclaim your place at the top of the food chain.
70050000066648.intro: Unleash the fury of fire and chaos!
70050000066648.name: Raptor Evolution: Infermadon DLC

70050000066650.description:
Radiate strength and grace with the Celestosaurus skin - a majestic raptor glowing with cosmic energy. 

Power up your journey with valuable resources that will fuel your evolution and help you face every challenge ahead.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Celestosaurus Skin
- 400 Meat
- 15 Mutagen
- 500 Gems

Unleash your full potential and reclaim your place at the top of the food chain.
70050000066650.intro: Soar beyond the stars with celestial power!
70050000066650.name: Raptor Evolution: Celestosaurus DLC

70050000066711.description:
Crush your enemies from inside the mighty Iron Patriot mech! Rain firepower upon invaders and turn the tide with enhanced strength, speed, and durability. Once deployed, nothing can stand in your way.

Boost your campaign with 1000 coins to upgrade your weapons, turrets, and base - or repair the front lines when the fight gets tough.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Iron Patriot Mech (x1.5 movement speed, x1.5 max health, x1.5 base damage)
- 1000 Coins

Rule the battlefield with unstoppable steel and fire!
70050000066711.intro: Suit up and dominate the battlefield!
70050000066711.name: Fight For America: Iron Patriot DLC

70050000066714.description:
Unleash the ultimate energy with the Zap Gun! Strike down hordes of enemies with devastating electric blasts that chain through multiple targets and deal massive long-range damage.

Boost your campaign with 4000 coins to upgrade your weapons, turrets, and base - or repair the front lines when the fight gets tough.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Zap Gun
- 4000 Coins

Bring the thunder, turn the tide, and show no mercy!
70050000066714.intro: Shock the battlefield with electrifying power!
70050000066714.name: Fight For America: Zap Gun DLC

70050000066716.description:
Unleash the Golden Amcar, a perfectly balanced assault rifle built for any fight. With solid damage, range, and fire rate, this golden masterpiece is your most versatile weapon on the battlefield – reliable, powerful, and shining bright in every mission.

Boost your campaign with 4000 coins to upgrade your weapons, turrets, and base - or repair the front lines when the fight gets tough.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Golden Amcar
- 4000 Coins

Lock, load, and let your golden firepower shine!
70050000066716.intro: Go for gold with the ultimate all-around weapon!
70050000066716.name: Fight For America: Golden Gun DLC

70050000066719.description:
Unleash fiery destruction with the Flamethrower and Grenade Launcher! Burn multiple enemies at once with a blazing stream of fire, or rain explosive chaos with powerful grenades that deal massive area damage. No matter the threat, you’ll reduce it to rubble and ash.

Boost your campaign with 2500 coins to upgrade your weapons, turrets, and base - or repair the front lines when the fight gets tough.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Flamethrower
- Grenade Launcher
- 2500 Coins

Burn through enemy lines and leave nothing but ashes behind!
70050000066719.intro: Ignite the battlefield and watch your enemies burn!
70050000066719.name: Fight For America: Fire Guns DLC

70050000066720.description:
Bring the cold to the front lines with the Snowball Launcher and Blizzard! Blast single targets with powerful snowballs that deal massive damage, or freeze entire enemy waves in their tracks with icy winds that slow them down. Perfect for setting up your turrets to finish the job.

Boost your campaign with 2500 coins to upgrade your weapons, turrets, and base - or repair the front lines when the fight gets tough.

With this DLC, you'll unlock:
- Snowball Launcher
- Blizzard
- 2500 Coins

Turn the tide with frost and fury, and show your enemies no mercy!
70050000066720.intro: Freeze the battlefield and shatter your enemies!
70050000066720.name: Fight For America: Ice Guns DLC

70070000032385.description:
Enjoy your short life as a hot dog playing SOLO or with FRIENDS! (up to 8 players)

This edition includes:
- base game with 150 deadly levels and tasty powerups
- fresh sausage pack of 15 new skins (Brain Monster, Eye Monster, Xray Monster, Caveman, Witch, Teacher, Angler, Country Girl, Hunter, Beekeeper, Firefly, Toxic, Painter, Policeman, Prisoner)

Choose your sausage and run for your life! This race is a hot dog’s dream - or nightmare - depending on how well you do.
70070000032385.intro: The most exciting sausage race in the world! Let the bodies hit the floor in a ketchup bath!
70070000032385.name: Run Sausage Run!: Diamond Edition

70010000106111.description:
that plunges you into a realm where fear and survival intertwine. You assume the role of a fearless investigative reporter, part of a specialized unit dispatched to document the unfolding horrors within the desolate ruins of Pripyat. However, your mission takes a sinister turn when your helicopter is brutally attacked by an enigmatic creature, leaving you as the sole survivor amidst the eerie aftermath.
In this relentless struggle for survival, you must navigate treacherous environments, battling grotesque mutants and hostile adversaries while unearthing the chilling secrets buried within Chernobyl's shadowy depths. Armed with your wits, firearms, and an array of melee weapons, you'll delve into abandoned buildings and hazardous territories, scavenging for crucial supplies and piecing together the fragmented truth.

Game Features:
	•	Immersive Horror Atmosphere: Prepare to be immersed in a chilling atmosphere enriched with unsettling sounds, nerve-wracking jump scares, and haunting soundtracks that amplify the tension.
	•	Dynamic Gameplay Mechanics: Master the art of interaction with the environment, from scavenging essential resources to manipulating environmental elements for tactical advantage.
	•	Survival Essentials: Manage hunger, thirst, and inventory meticulously as you navigate a realistic day-night cycle that dynamically influences gameplay.
	•	Narrative Depth: Engage with a compelling storyline driven by your quest to survive, uncover the mysteries of Chernobyl, and confront the horrors that lurk in its darkest corners.
	•	Combat Mastery: Enhance your combat prowess through precision aiming, strategic melee combat, and unexpected encounters that test your reflexes and resourcefulness.

Escape From Pripyat challenges you to confront your deepest fears, to unravel the enigma of Chernobyl's haunting legacy, and to emerge victorious from the abyss. Are you prepared to face the unknown, reporter? Your odyssey into darkness begins now.
70010000106111.intro: Survive the silent ruins where danger lurks in every shadow.
70010000106111.name: Chernobyl: Escape from Pripyat

70010000112707.description:
Inspired by the gritty atmosphere and taut suspense of 80s slasher films, Christmas Mutilator™ is a gripping, stealth-driven horror experience set in the chilly seclusion of a lonely, snow-covered cabin. You take on the role of Amelia, a loving mother and wife who has traveled to the remote cabin to celebrate Christmas with her husband, Adam, and kids. But when a murderous maniac starts stalking the cabin, your vacation plans take a terrible turn.

Features:
-Dynamic AI – The killer reacts to your environment and actions.
-Phone Mechanic – Read messages to uncover the dark lore.
-Custom Killer Masks – Switch up the killer’s look for added variety.
70010000112707.intro: An immersive horror and home invasion game
70010000112707.name: Christmas Mutilator ™

70010000114614.description:
Factorio is a game in which you build and maintain factories. You will be mining resources, researching technologies, building infrastructure, automating production and fighting enemies. In the beginning you will find yourself chopping trees, mining ores and crafting mechanical arms and transport belts by hand, but in short time you can become an industrial powerhouse, with huge solar fields, oil refining and cracking, manufacture and deployment of construction and logistic robots, all for your resource needs. However this heavy exploitation of the planet's resources does not sit nicely with the locals, so you will have to be prepared to defend yourself and your machine empire.

Join forces with other players in cooperative Multiplayer, create huge factories, collaborate and delegate tasks between you and your friends. While the core gameplay is in the form of the freeplay scenario, there are a range of interesting challenges in the form of Scenarios. If you don't find any maps or scenarios you enjoy, you can create your own with the in-game Map Editor, place down entities, enemies, and terrain in any way you like.
70010000114614.name: Factorio – Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition

70050000066920.description:
Mouse mode: Using the Joy-Con™ 2 Mouse Sensor, the left or right Joy-Con 2 can be used as a mouse.
Better resolution: The game will run on the screen's native 1080p resolution instead of 720p. In TV mode, it supports all resolutions, including 2160p (4K).
Variable refresh rate support for the console's screen.
Some higher quality animations.
Some higher resolution sprites.
Other visual improvements.
Faster loading times.
Ability to build much larger bases.
70050000066920.name: Factorio – Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition Upgrade Pack

70010000102022.description:
Winter’s chill has settled over the city, turning love into obsession and passion into crime. As a dedicated detective, you’ll uncover secrets buried beneath the snow — investigating shocking murders, robberies, and betrayals that test both your logic and your heart.

KEY FEATURES
- Solve Chilling Crimes – Examine clues, interrogate suspects, and piece together evidence to crack complex cases.
- Work with Your Team – Team up with your chief and quirky colleagues to restore order to the city.
- Explore a Frozen Cityscape – Discover cozy cafés, dark alleys, and snow-covered streets full of hidden clues.
- Unmask the Villain – Follow a trail of lies and uncover the mastermind behind the chaos.
- Beautiful Minimalistic Art – Experience a sleek, winter-inspired visual style that brings Mystery City to life.

Crowded Mysteries 2: Winter Romance is a heartfelt detective story where every clue melts the ice — or freezes your fate.
Enter the cold. Unravel the truth. Feel the chill of winter romance.
70010000102022.intro: Justice never sleeps, even in the coldest nights.
70010000102022.name: Crowded Mysteries 2: Winter Romance

70070000032038.description:
Awaken your inner engineer with the brainteasing circuitry of Electronics Puzzle Lab! In this fun and educational 3D puzzle game, your task is to inspect circuit boards and make adjustments to power LED lights. Take a seat at your workbench, cut wires, flip switches and more as you trace the path of the current.

This collection contains 2 games:

Electronics Puzzle Lab
Electronics Puzzle Lab 2
70070000032038.intro: Awaken your inner engineer with 3D puzzles inspired by electronic circuitry!
70070000032038.name: Electronics Puzzle Lab 1 & 2 Collection

70010000091947.description:
Celebrate the holiday season with Hidden Cats on Christmas, a cozy and charming hidden object adventure!
Search through beautifully decorated rooms, snowy landscapes, and festive scenes to find adorable hidden cats.
Each discovery brings joy and adds to your Christmas spirit. Relax, explore, and enjoy the heartwarming art and music as you uncover every secret and every cat hidden among the winter magic.

Key Features:
•	Festive Hidden Object Gameplay – Spot hidden cats in colorful holiday scenes.
•	Beautiful Christmas Settings – Explore snowy villages, cozy rooms, and decorated streets.
•	Relaxing & Cozy – Enjoy calming music and charming visuals while playing.
•	Challenging Puzzles – Find tricky cats hidden in detailed environments.
•	Progression & Rewards – Unlock achievements and festive surprises.
•	Seasonal Fun – Experience the warmth and joy of Christmas in every scene.

Uncover every hidden cat, embrace the holiday spirit, and make this Christmas unforgettable.
70010000091947.intro: Discover the magic of winter in every hidden corner.
70010000091947.name: Hidden Cats on Christmas

70050000056419.description: Adds Character 2 to the roster of playable characters.
70050000056419.name: Additional Character 2

70070000031785.description:
This bundle contains the first two set of Woodle Tree videogames!

Woodle Tree Adventures
is an old school platform game with a catchy and unique art style! Explore a total of 6 worlds and save the lands with the magical water drops you'll find through your journey, bringing back peace and balance and finally becoming the new hero!


Woodle Tree 2: Worlds
is an open world platformer/adventure game. This time the forces of evil are taking over the Wood Lands with a black substance that is absorbing energy and life from the living creatures! Will you be able to take over this enormous new evil force?
70070000031785.name: Woodle Tree Bundle

70010000109922.description:
Step into the world, where mundane tasks turn into little adventures and ordinary items provide so much joy. See everything around you in bright, new, vibrant colors and make things even more beautiful by adding fun patterns. Wake up your inner child and find the happiness in little things.
 
Each level of the game consists of a unique challenge, providing fresh, yet relaxing gameplay, that will make you curious for what’s coming next.  

KEY FEATURES: 
-40 unique cozy puzzle levels
-Gameplay consisting of different types of challenges
-Beautiful, vibrant visuals, where everyday items turn into something magical
-Relaxing, cheerful soundtrack 
-Inspiring, nostalgic atmosphere
-Variety of puzzles exercising different parts of the brain
70010000109922.intro: Unleash the childlike wonder and find the magic in everyday life! Place, fit, fill, cook, connect, and train your brain in the cutest possible way.
70010000109922.name: Softly Placed

70010000111239.description:
A Sokoban-style puzzle game featuring 8-bit pixel art, chiptune soundtrack and 100 handcrafted levels.

Step into the boots of the newest recruit of the Island Courier Guild and deliver enchanted parcels to seal points scattered across the ocean-touched isles.

Play as Kai or Nami, and push, plan, and puzzle your way through a world of clever challenges to prove yourself as the next Master Courier!
70010000111239.intro: A Sokoban-style puzzle game with pixel art
70010000111239.name: Parcel Push

70070000029841.description:
Dive into non-stop entertainment with 12 Party Games Collection - a bundle packed with exciting games that bring instant fun to any gathering.

Jump between fan-favorite hits: Hole io, Paper io 2, Skyline Bowling, Mob Control, Candivity, Golf Guys, Aquapark io, Ball Blast, Helix Jump, Puff Up, Pocket Mini Golf, and Pocket Mini Golf 2. Each game offers its own twist - from quick reflex challenges and arcade chaos to skill-based precision and pure, satisfying gameplay.

Play solo to master each game or share the joy with friends in friendly competitions up to 4 players! Discover your favorites, chase new high scores, and see who dominates the next round. Whether it’s a quick session or an all-night gaming marathon, every match brings something fresh to the table.

12 ways to play -12 times the fun!
70070000029841.intro: 12 games. Endless fun. One ultimate party pack!
70070000029841.name: 12 Party Games Collection

70070000031461.description:
Outsmart a villain in Agent A: A puzzle in disguise and unravel the islands secrets deep Down in Bermuda. 

Two unforgettable puzzle adventures packed with mystery, exploration, and clever twists - all together in one must-have collection.
70070000031461.name: Agent A & Down in Bermuda Bundle

70070000032331.description:
Grab your bricks, get building, and race to the finish line before your rivals even lay their first stone! Collect bricks of your color and build your bridge to the next level. Got some extra bricks? Use them to expand your castle and unlock quirky new brick designs!

This bundle includes:
- Bridge Race
- Bridge Race: Medieval DLC
- Bridge Race: Busy DLC
- Bridge Race: Funny DLC

NEW VERSUS MODE FOR UP TO 4 PLAYERS!
Compete with your friends in an exciting head-to-head split-screen showdown. Choose your custom color and unique skin, set the number of rounds, and let your building skills shine. Earn points each round based on your finish, and see who rises to the top of the leaderboard. Ready to show off your skills and claim victory? 

Features:
- 11 additional skins to show off your style!
- 35000 coins to help you on your journey!
- Build across endless levels of fun!
- Local multiplayer mode for up to 4 players!
- Customize your bricks and character for a unique look!
- Expand your castle with extra bricks!
- Challenge yourself in epic bonus and boss stages!

Want to slow the competition down? No problem! Trip them up and zoom ahead to claim first place. Crush those bonus levels to stack up coins, and then use them to unlock new skins and colors to show off your style!

Outbuild, outsmart, and outlast the competition -who knew building bridges could be this much fun?
70070000032331.intro: Build your way to victory, one brick at a time!
70070000032331.name: Bridge Race: Platinum Edition

70010000106803.description:
COUCH MULTIPLAYER CRAZINESS

Up to 4 players can compete in spit-screen action. Party scoring means nobody is ever out of the game. Random tracks are picked until a player reaches 15 points. That means each round of fun can be from under ten minutes to as long as it takes to crown a winner!

MAKE AND TAKE YOUR OWN SHORTCUTS

Power-up items are all about juice. Leave a trail of your color while cutting across rough terrain, then drive on it again next lap. Or leave yourself bouncy fruit bumps to jump over walls and obstacles. Just watch out, you may reveal your secret early and allow other players to take it for themselves! Other players' juice will slow you down.

TIGHT CONTROLS AND HANDLING

Familiar, responsive controls work for all racing styles, whether you're a drift wizard or a safe driver. Quick acceleration and short spinouts mean you'll always be in control and part of the action.

16 TRACKS AND COUNTING

There are 16 unique tracks with tight corners, hills and valleys, and lots of boosts. Each has multiple hidden shortcuts ready to be found and used for the win!
70010000106803.intro: Splash and smash your friends in this juicy party kart racing game! Make and take speedy shortcuts as you compete against the sweetest competition.
70010000106803.name: Juiced Fruit Racing

70010000111784.description:
A little girl with a big heart goes on a mysterious journey through dangerous lands ruled by a ruthless cult. Make choices that will help her save her parents. You decide what happens in the story!

In Adventure Reborn the story depends on your choices. It’s a magical tale about the power of love overcoming the evil. Become a part of it, help Hope solve all the puzzles and save her parents. This family’s fate is in your hands!

Why are you going to love Adventure Reborn:
- A touching story about the power of love
- Your choices influence the story
- An adventure full of twists and surprises
- The characters’ fates depend on your decisions
- A story of a family that risks it all to be together
70010000111784.intro: Adventure Reborn is a deeply moving adventure game where you make decisions that influence the story of a loving family!
70010000111784.name: Adventure Reborn

70050000051004.description: Ticket to Ride: Winter includes a Board, 2 characters, 2 locomotives and 2 carriages.
70050000051004.name: Ticket to Ride: Winter

70010000086482.description:
Dunk Dunk is a basketball game unlike any other, mixing a unique cartoony aesthetic, the strategy and precision of basketball with the chaotic fun of multiplayer arena platforming action, making for some nail-bitingly tense matches.

Play alone, with a friend or a house full of friends. Dress up your mascots and dunk basketballs, balloons or even anvils in crazy locations from all over the universe like space stations, dinosaur parks and haunted houses. It's dunk or be dunked (on). 

EASY TO PICK UP
Plays like your favourite platformer with familiar and simple controls meaning anyone can take to the court and start dunking.

MASTER YOUR BALL CONTROL
AIM & THROW – Total 360° analogue arm control allows you to AIM, THROW and slam DUNK the ball at the exact angle you want. 

BLOCK & DEFLECT – Defend your goal! Extend your whole body for a stretchy block or deflection to keep your opponents from scoring. Or, become a platform to help your teammates reach that hoop.

FEINT & SHIELD – Fool your opponent with a fake throw or shield the ball by holding it out of your opponent's reach.

SOLO, CO-OP AND PVP MODES
Play solo or co-op with a friend in Quick Match, or against increasingly harder opponents in Galaxy Tour, Challenge or Cup modes. Or take on a friend, or up to 16 friends, in local multiplayer across the Quick Match, Mutator Madness and Tournament modes.

CUSTOMISE YOUR DUNKER
Want to play as a purple-robo-vampire-shark? We got it covered. Customise your characters with hundreds of different body parts and more than 2 and a half million procedural team and player names. Who knows, there might even be cameo appearances. Wouldn't that be cool?

DUNK ACROSS THE UNIVERSE
Play across 8 unique arenas from all over the universe. From an underwater lab to dinosaur times and a marooned space station, each arena has its own special features.
70010000086482.intro: Dunk with or on your friends in Dunk Dunk, a multiplayer action basketball arcade party game full of chaotic fun.
70010000086482.name: Dunk Dunk

70050000046105.description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with this new DLC.
70050000046105.name: SnowRunner - Season 15: Oil & Dirt

70050000047078.description: Expand your Expeditions: A MudRunner Game experience with this new DLC.
70050000047078.name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Season 3

70050000051054.description: Ticket to Ride: Germany includes a Board, 2 characters, 2 locomotives and 2 carriages.
70050000051054.name: Ticket to Ride: Germany

70050000053042.description:
Vagrus’s second expansion, At the Heart of Ruin, offers a tight but multi-layered and dense region fraught with conflict and rich with opportunities. Vagri who decide to brave the forsaken paths of this broken realm will be challenged not only by new foes and villains, but also by the very nature one must traverse the mountainous terrain.

New Content and Features

- A fresh, dangerous region unfettered from Imperial dominance and brimming with peril
- A dark narrative adventure with several overarching stories as well as shorter adventures
- Deep quests with multiple outcomes and a plethora of personalities
- Many new opportunities and challenges for traders, mercenaries, and explorers
- A host of new enemies, be they crazed scavengers or creatures cursed beyond recognition
- A large cast of NPCs, some new and some old, who can be a part of your story
- New minor factions the likes of which few vagri have ever had the chance to befriend or fight against
- New obstacles, rewards, lore, and more of our signature visual art
70050000053042.name: Vagrus - The Riven Realms At the Heart of Ruin

70010000111820.description:
With his children away on the moon, there is no time to relax for Dr. Cavor. Once again, Victoria is under attack. The aging but brilliant scientist begins research on a new means of defense. After much work, he finds success with Mechanized Assault Unity 19 -- M.A.U.S. 

There's no time to spare as MAUS must defeat a mysterious robotic horde that lurks on the outskirts of town. With a blaster gun on her arm and the ability to upgrade on the fly, MAUS will travel to outer space, ancient ruins, and an old forest to defeat her enemies.

It is a quick, sci-fi adventure inspired by classic 16-bit and 8-bit retro platform games.
70010000111820.intro: A quick, sci-fi adventure inspired by classic 16-bit and 8-bit retro platform games.
70010000111820.name: M.A.U.S

70010000114318.description:
Ready to Write Your Own Fashion Story?

Experience the thrill of managing the city's most popular clothing store from scratch on Nintendo Switch™ with Clothing Store Simulator! Transforming a small shop into a huge fashion hub is entirely in your hands.

Impress Customers with Your Style Stock your shelves with the trendiest dresses, stylish shirts, and eye-catching accessories. Understand your customers' needs, offer the right products, and build a loyal customer base by increasing satisfaction.

Redesign Your Store Selling clothes isn't enough; the atmosphere matters! Choose from a vast catalog of furniture. Arrange shelves, fitting rooms, and decorations to your taste. A minimalist boutique or a colorful shopping haven? You are the designer!

Grow and Expand Invest your earnings wisely. Physically expand your store, add more product variety, and boost your sales volume. Manage checkout lines and ensure your store always looks perfect.

Features:

Detailed Store Management: Track stock, set prices, and manage profit margins.

Customizable Interior: Design every corner, from wall colors to furniture.

Dynamic Customer System: Interact with customers having different expectations.

Progression System: A journey from a small business to a giant brand.

Unlock the doors to the fashion world and become the tycoon of retail with Clothing Store Simulator!
70010000114318.intro: Design your dream boutique, sell trendy clothes, and build a fashion empire! It's your turn to shine in Clothing Store Simulator.
70010000114318.name: Clothing Store Simulator

70010000106500.description:
Go Kart Island is an open world kart racer with full story mode! 

Lachlan the highland cow has a dream to become Go Kart Champion, but the Mayor has an election campaign to fund and demands you raise 1,000 coins for an "entry fee" to the BIG RACE. 

Fortunately the inhabitants of Go Kart Island have no shortage of activities they would like you to partake in and they offer cold, hard cash as a reward.

EVENT TYPES

Races: Classic karting rules apply in 6 different race types, use items to take out your opponents and reach the finish in 1st place! 
Time Trials: The islanders are an impatient bunch and need your help to get to their destination as fast as possible, just watch out for obstacles.
Collect: Things are lost, and you have to track them down and run them over with your kart as fast as possible.
Chase: Either hunt down a target or escape from your pursuers.
Deliver: Pick up customers and get them to their destination as quickly as possible in the pursuit of a high score!

KEY FEATURES

- A full story mode with 34 different events in an open world setting.
- Giraffes? Turtles? SHEEP? We’ve got ‘em all. 32 different animals to chat with, race against, and unlock!
- Aim for the gold trophy in 84 challenges, adding a new twist and replayability to events completed in story mode.
- A variety of items to use on opponents and obstacles to avoid, including the homing pizza (delivered in 3 seconds or less), the splatula (get it? Splatula! Cause it splats…) and the aptly named Squish-E-Boi Cube.
- Over 150 collectables to find. Collect coins, gems and smash the mayor’s advertising boards!
- Fully honkable kart horn. HONK!
70010000106500.intro: An open world kart racer! Use items, driftslide and boost your way to championship glory.
70010000106500.name: Go Kart Island

70010000104756.description:
Moles have declared war. The animal world is in chaos. Naturally, the solution is tanks.

In BattleTanks - Animal Wars, you’ll roll into battle as a Racoon, Bear, Wolf or even Panda (yes, really) and blast your way through five bizarre worlds filled with explosions, bad driving, and questionable military decisions.

Customize your ride with different weapons and weird tank parts. 

- 80+ story missions featuring combat, defense, side-scrolling chaos, and puzzles
- Ridiculous mech-bosses that really, really don’t like you
- Local co-op for up to 4 players - because friendship means firing wildly in every direction

Switch between top-down mayhem and first-person fury, and take down the mole menace once and for all. Or at least… blow them up repeatedly.
70010000104756.intro:
Save the animal kingdom from mole-fueled doom.
Face giant mech-bosses, collect weapons and build your tank.
Unleash tank fury - solo or with friends!
70010000104756.name: BattleTanks - Animal Wars

70010000110440.description:
Build your own paradise as you explore, create, and customize in the Animal Crossing™: New Horizons – Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition game. Catch insects at the crack of dawn, decorate your paradise throughout the day, or enjoy a sunset on the beach while fishing in the ocean—all with enhanced resolution, faster load times, mouse control support for faster and easier decorating, a megaphone for calling your animal residents that uses the system microphone, and more.

If you and your friends all have the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, you can share your island in 12-player sessions online*—and with CameraPlay and GameChat** support, you can see and hear their reactions in real time!

Show your island to family and friends—or create together on Slumber Island*

Host friends on your island utopia or pack your bags and visit theirs. Whether playing online* or with others beside you***, island living is even better when you can share it—and with a Nintendo Switch Online membership, you can also visit Slumber Island to terraform, build, and decorate with friends and family in a shared dreamscape. 

Even without hopping on a flight or sharing a dream, you’ll meet a cast of charming animal residents bursting with personality. Friendly faces like Tom Nook and Isabelle will happily help you grow your community. They can also offer you services, like Resetti’s Reset Service to clear out any unwanted decorations. Your island getaway is yours to shape however you please—whenever and wherever you want.

Decorate hotel rooms for tourists, craft items in batches, and more! 

Work for Kapp’n and his family at a resort hotel where each guest can stay in a room designed by you! Help visiting tourists get acquainted with your accommodations, and scan amiibo™ figures and cards**** to invite special guests to stay in your VIP room.
 
And with the most recent free update available to all Animal Crossing™: New Horizons players, crafting has never been easier! You can now craft items in batches and pull materials directly from your storage.

Already have Animal Crossing™: New Horizons for Nintendo Switch? Purchase the upgrade pack! 
    
If you already own the game for Nintendo Switch, you can purchase the upgrade pack***** separately to enjoy all the enhancements of the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition.
70010000110440.intro: Escape to a deserted island...now enhanced for the Nintendo Switch™ 2 system!
70010000110440.name: Animal Crossing™: New Horizons – Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition

70050000064914.description:
Enhance your deserted island life with this upgrade pack*. Animal Crossing™: New Horizons – Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition features enhanced resolution, faster load times, mouse control support for faster and easier decorating, a megaphone for calling your animal residents that uses the system microphone, and more. 

If you and your friends all have the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition, you can share your island in 12-player sessions online**—and with CameraPlay*** and GameChat**** support, you can see and hear their reactions in real time!

Decorate hotel rooms for tourists, create together on Slumber Island**, and more in a free update

Help Kapp’n and his family at a resort hotel where each guest can stay in a room designed by you! Help visiting tourists get acquainted with your accommodations, and scan amiibo™ figures and cards***** to invite specific guests to stay in your VIP room.

The free update is available to all Animal Crossing™: New Horizons players and includes a few more additions to make crafting items and managing your island a little easier. You can now craft items in batches, pulling materials directly from your storage—and if you’re looking to change things up and get rid of unwanted decorations quickly, look no further than Resetti’s Reset Service.

Nintendo Switch Online members can also visit Slumber Island to terraform, build, and decorate with friends and family in a shared dreamscape. It’s a great time to return to island life!
70050000064914.intro: Upgrade your island paradise for the Nintendo Switch 2 system!
70050000064914.name: Animal Crossing™: New Horizons – Nintendo Switch™ 2 Edition Upgrade Pack

70010000105629.description:
Dustland Delivery is a post-apocalyptic survival business simulator, featuring over 40 hours of gameplay content. Scour the wastes for profit, complete missions to grow your trading empire, and assemble a rag-tag band of adventurers to turn your city into the capital of the Dustlands. Danger lurks around every corner—but no risk, no reward!

Marshal Resources to Build Your Dustland Empire
 •  A vast game world with a rich narrative to explore
 • Establish trade routes across unique settlements to become a kingpin of the wastes
 • Control resource flows to build magnificent cities
 
Transform Your Truck for Apocalyptic Adventures
 • Create your own mobile base to cruise through the Dustlands
 • Install mods to turn your truck into a deadly weapon against infected swarms
 
A Cast of Unique Companions
 • Recruit a rag-tag group of adventurers with distinctive traits
 • Assign different roles to help build your city
 • Tool up and train animal companions to boost your team's stats
 • Undead? No excuse not to show up for work...
 
Random Events, Freedom to Choose
 • Countless random events: armored motorcades, undead raids, unknown signals from mysterious locations...
 • Your Dustland, your way: become a warrior for justice, a money-grubbing merchant, or an infamous bandit
 
Struggle for Power, Rebuild the Wastes
 • 6 major factions with a web of complex relations
 • Exploit power struggles and trading rivalries to come out on top
 • Form alliances, stir up trouble, and build your own power base
 
Complex Weather System
 • Forge a path through the Dustlands while fighting storms and hidden dangers
 • Set up camp to shelter from the elements, then ride out at daybreak
70010000105629.intro: Grow your trading empire in a post-apocalyptic wasteland.
70010000105629.name: Dustland Delivery

70010000096780.description:
Outrun your friends. Outsmart your rivals. Out-chaos them all!
From the makers of Running Fable comes Petite Party, a wild and unpredictable spin-off that cranks up the chaos. Battle through 16 competitive mini-games and dominate the tabletop party board where anything goes. In Running Fable Petite Party, there’s no holding back — every round is a chance to taunt your friends, steal victory, and cause maximum mayhem.

Key Features:
- 16 Mayhem-Fueled Mini-Games – Outsprint, outbalance, outwit, or outright sabotage your friends in quick-fire challenges designed to trigger laughs and playful rage.
- Tabletop Strategy Meets Party Madness – Roll the dice and plan across 3 competitive boards where the smallest choices lead to the biggest betrayals.
- Rivalry Ready – Perfect for 1–4 players; whether you’re teaming up or turning on each other, every match is a test of speed, reflexes, and friendship.
- Designed for Teasing – Easy controls mean anyone can join in, but only the bold (and lucky) can claim victory. Trash talk encouraged.
- From the World of Running Fable – Return to a vibrant, fabled universe full of quirky characters, ridiculous physics, and hilarious animations.

It’s not just a party — it’s a battlefield disguised in balloons.
Running Fable Petite Party is what happens when tabletop strategy meets competitive chaos. Who will stand victorious? And who will never live that loss down?
70010000096780.intro: Running Fable Petite Party throws you and your friends into 16 fast-paced, friendship-testing mini-games across 3 tabletop arenas.
70010000096780.name: Running Fable Petite Party

Challenge legendary demon kings from the DRAGON QUEST series’ Erdrick Trilogy in the Battle Arena! Defeat them to earn valuable rewards, including “Erdrick’s Sword”!

<Jam-Packed Swag Bag>

Set forth on your journey with these helpful items!

[Contents]

70070000029520.description:
Includes the full game, "Additional DLC Sets", and 48 hours of early access to the full game. Embark on an epic adventure ahead of everybody else!

[Contents]
・DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined base game
・DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined "Additional DLC Sets"
    Additional DLC - The Road of Regal Wretches
    Additional DLC - Luminary's Livery
    Additional DLC - Jam-Packed Swag Bag
・48 hours of early access
・White Wolf Costume (Appearance changing costume for Ruff)

*After the launch of DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined, the "Additional DLC Sets" and each additional DLC will also be available for individual purchase. Please be careful to avoid making duplicate purchases.
*Some items in the additional DLCs can also be obtained by progressing in the game.
*To play The Road of Regal Wretches, you will need to progress in the game and unlock the battle arena.
*The Road of Regal Wretches can be accessed by talking to the She-Slime at the battle arena reception desk.
*Contents such as the costumes and items can be received from the "Claim Special Rewards" menu in the game.

*This product is a bundle that includes DRAGON QUEST VII, released for Nintendo Switch™, and additional content pertaining to that title.
*This product can be played on both Nintendo Switch™ and Nintendo Switch™ 2, but there is also a separate version of DRAGON QUEST VII that can only be played on Nintendo Switch™ 2.
*This product is not compatible with the DRAGON QUEST VII Digital Deluxe Upgrade released for Nintendo Switch™ 2.
*The content included in this bundle is also sold separately. Please be careful to avoid making duplicate purchases.
70070000029520.intro: Unravel the mysteries of the past in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined
70070000029520.name: DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined Digital Deluxe Edition

70010000070157.description:
"There's more to the world than this island... And we're going to prove it!"

Set sail on an adventure spanning past and present in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined!

As a bright-eyed young fisherman's son, you've lived your entire life on the peaceful island of Estard. Your journey begins with a simple question: is there more to the world than this small island kingdom?

On a quest for answers, you and your childhood friends discover the Shrine of Mysteries and are swept back in time. There, you uncover the shocking truth that entire lands have been sealed away by a malevolent force.

The fate of the world now rests in your hands.

DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined brings a timeless classic to life in a whole new way with charming diorama visuals, updated gameplay mechanics, and a streamlined story,.

For seasoned adventurers, rediscover a tale of plucky companions that is brimming with joy and heartbreak. For fledgling heroes new to the series, this is a great place to begin your DRAGON QUEST journey.

■A Diorama Brought to Life
DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined blends a beautiful diorama art style with Akira Toriyama's iconic character designs to make every encounter feel vibrant, heartfelt, and full of adventure. From lush forests and bustling towns to ancient ruins and whimsical monsters, every environment is bursting with color and personality.

■Travel through History to Restore the Present
Scattered stone fragments unlock portals to long-lost eras with their own challenges to solve. Restore the islands, solve mysteries, and make allies in the past to breathe life back into the present.

■A Beloved Tale with a Streamlined Narrative
DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined is told through a series of vignettes with an overarching narrative. The main story has also been streamlined to make the journey more accessible to all players. 

■Classic Combat, Improved!
The battle system in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined has undergone significant changes. Turn the tides of battle with new vocational perks. Each vocation has its own unique ability, from all-out attacks to those that support your allies. Battle speed adjustments and an auto-battle feature are also available. Battles can progress without interruptions between each turn, depending on the tactics selected for the protagonist and allies. While on the field, players can pre-emptively strike monsters and instantly defeat them If the monster is weaker than the party. 

■Moonlight and Level Up Two Vocations at the Same Time!
Customize your playstyle with the new Moonlighting mechanic. Having two vocations assigned at once provides access to the skills, magic spells, and unique perks from both.
70010000070157.intro: Unravel the mysteries of the past in DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined
70010000070157.name: DRAGON QUEST VII Reimagined

70010000105926.description:
[Game Overview]  
A roguelite action game set in the BLAZBLUE universe, featuring striking 2D visuals, stylish, fast-paced combat, and precise, responsive controls.
Command a line-up of unique characters from the renowned BLAZBLUE franchise and dive into an unparalleled action experience.
[Story]
At a mysterious domain, known as “the Lab”, a group of elite researchers race to save a collapsing word; however, despite their efforts to date, Dr. Mercurius, head of the laboratory, still warns the world’s downfall is near.
In a last-ditch effort, the urgent *Research of Possibility* initiative seeks to collect *Shards of Possibility*—a special fragment of the world that could forestall the seemingly inevitable destruction.
These shards lie within the *Sea of Possibility*, a realm between worlds, beyond the bounds of reality.
Our protagonist, *Ace*, is the only being capable of diving into this sea.  
Guided by the elite researchers at *the Lab*, Ace descends again and again in pursuit of salvation—until strange visions take hold and his body begins to change.
As Ace continues to dive, countless memories flood his mind, and the truth behind the collapsing world—and the research itself—begins to surface....
“……The Power of Azure.”
70010000105926.name: Blazblue Entropy Effect X

70010000091799.description:
Lead a rag-tag group of kooky carriers in this delivery service RPG as they protect and trek packages through treacherous terrain, unruly monsters, and meet other sneaky delivery service teams ready to stake their claim as the best delivery service in the Orkotris Region!

Rain or shine—a new adventure awaits with every package! 

Key Features

In the Mood for Battle? – Running a tip-top delivery service means mailing out orders AND keeping your crew in check. Watch their moods—if they’re unhappy, they might ignore your commands, but their negligence could deliver positive surprises and even victories in battle!

Out for Delivery! – Head to the Bulletin Board and see what deliveries await! Inspect the parcel, pack it tightly (no gaps allowed!), and assemble your crew with the right gear (to bonk any pesky foes) and tools for a smooth drop-off. Each successful drop-off delivers sweet rewards your way, so handle with care!

Delivery in 3-5 Business Days (Unless you Run into a Boss) – Start your adventure with a roulette spin to determine your next move. Land on shop spaces for goodies, collect special packages for rewards, and maybe tackle some sneaky bosses along the way!

Kei Nanameda… Delivers! – From the character designer of Mary Skelter and Death end re;Quest, Kei Nanameda presents a fresh delivery service world with lively dialogue, intense battles, and a quirky cast full of energy!
70010000091799.intro: First-class fun in this delivery service RPG with a board game twist!
70010000091799.name: Calamity Angels: Special Delivery

70050000056217.description:

70050000056217.intro: Unlocks a new world for hexceed: Violaceum brings 120 new puzzles and includes all mechanics from the previous DLC.
70050000056217.name: Violaceum

70010000081139.description:
Tales of Berseria returns with enhanced graphics and optimized gameplay!

Engage in the ultimate quest for self-discovery, remastered for the first time. The sacred kingdom awaits the arrival of its savior, and a lone woman named Velvet is marked by traumatic deceit. Join Velvet on her journey for vengeance, along with her cast of eccentric companions, as they sail through the archipelago which comprises the kingdom of Midgand.

• A Tale of Emotion Versus Reason
Let emotions guide your destiny, or maintain order with the power of reason. Witness the eternal struggle between the head and the heart as Velvet is challenged to stand by her convictions while the world around her compresses into a system of order.

• An Exhilarating Combat System
Freely choose Artes to suit your playstyle and perform a variety of combos. Collect enemy Souls to unleash a barrage of attacks for a thrilling battle experience.

• A Modern, High-Quality Retelling
Useful features like destination markers and the ability to disable enemy encounters make traversing the islands of Midgand all the more enticing. Visit the famous Grade Shop from the game's opening. Get a smooth play experience only found in this remaster!

• Access DLC from the First Iteration
This version features several DLC from the original 2016 version. A treasure trove of content awaits you, such as outfits for your characters from the previous Tales Of games along with useful equipment for your travels.

*A Deluxe Edition is also available. Be careful of duplicate purchases.
70010000081139.name: Tales of Berseria Remastered

70010000100973.description:
Sushi Cat Tower Defense introduces a new genre of gameplay to a beloved franchise!

This time around, Sushi Cat must defend himself from evil sushi hordes, corrupted by the wicked sorcerer cook Broccolinni. Only by eating enormous amounts of sushi will Sushi Cat be able to thwart Broccolinni's plans to control the world!

PREPARE YOU DEFENSES
• Deploy a variety of cat-themed towers
• Block key routes with maze-building walls
• Place traps to surprise and weaken enemies

ROGUELIKE STYLE
• Designed for quick runs with a single evolving level and Endless Mode
• Draft Boon Cards that define your strategy
• Defeat powerful boss enemies in every run
• Unlock permanent upgrades between games

SHAPE THE PATH
• Defend Sushi Cat from waves of sinister sushi enemies.
• Place defenses to prevent enemies from reaching Sushi Cat. Collect sushi and keep feeding him to expand his powers.
• Survive wave-based encounters while constructing obstacles, towers, & traps to build a winding maze for enemies to traverse through.

UNLOCK TALENTS & BOONS
• Upgrade your Talent Tree to unlock permanent power boosts.
• Unlock new towers and traps to expand your defensive options.
• Empower Sushi Cat with devastating new Ultimate abilities.
• Collect Boon Cards that shape each run with unique effects.
70010000100973.intro: Strategic tower defense meets roguelite chaos!
70010000100973.name: Sushi Cat - Tower Defense
